Articles.Content:
No actual modeling done here, just a quick tweak of the stock tricoupler to give 90, 180, and 270 degree rotated versions. This isn't much use with the stock set of parts, but can be pretty useful in combination with things like the Joyeuese 2+1 couplers. (The example rocket OrbitalTwelve requires those couplers in addition to the rotated tricouplers.)

edit: forgot to attach the tricouplers
Thanks a lot, now I can get my rockets nice and symmetrical.

Note that the latest versions are in the Projects and Releases forum:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=154.0

There were no changes in the couplers, but this version of the OrbitalTwelve will just fly apart spectacularly when you try to launch it in a recent version of KSP.

anyone else having troubles with this zip package?

its probably encoded in some propertiary code that 7zip nor the windows zip handler can access or the upload simply broke.

The attachments are pre-server migration and are probably borked. Try finding them on the repository.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
